metadata.Title: CVE-2021-27358 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The snapshot feature in Grafana 6.7.3 through 7.4.1 can allow anunauthenticated remote attackers to trigger a Denial of Service via aremote API call if a commonly used configuration is set.

criterions.comment: grafana: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
